Description: The system shall allow users to reserve a parking spot via mobile app.
The system shall process cashless payments using credit or debit cards.
The system shall notify users of available parking in real-time.
The system shall generate a daily report of parking usage statistics.
The system shall send an alert when the parking lot is full.
The system shall allow admin to view historical parking data.
The system shall ensure users can log in with secure credentials.
The system shall support multiple languages in the user interface.
The system shall allow users to cancel their parking reservation.
The system shall log all user interactions for audit purposes.
